Financial Analyst

Accounting New York, NY Full-time

ABOUT PLACER.AI

Placer.ai is transforming how organizations understand the physical world. Our location analytics platform provides unprecedented visibility into locations, markets, and consumer behavior. Placer empowers thousands of customers—from Fortune 500 companies to local governments and nonprofits—to make smarter, data-driven decisions.

What sets us apart?

  • Innovation & Privacy: We’ve built the most advanced location intelligence platform while maintaining an uncompromising commitment to privacy.
  • Rapid Growth: We reached $100M in annual recurring revenue within 6 years, achieved unicorn status ($1B+ valuation) in 2022, and continue to expand as one of North America’s fastest-growing tech companies.
  • Recognition: Named one of Forbes America’s Best Startup Employers and a Deloitte Technology Fast 500 company.

THE ROLE

We are seeking a Financial Analyst to join our finance team and support strategic planning and analysis. You’ll work closely with leadership to provide insights that drive key business decisions, from pricing strategies to investment priorities. This role offers exposure to all aspects of SaaS financial operations in a high-growth environment.

RESPONSIBILITIES

  • Financial Planning: Support annual budgeting and quarterly forecasting processes
  • Business Analysis: Analyze key metrics including ARR, churn, CAC, and LTV
  • Reporting: Create executive dashboards and financial reports for leadership team
  • Variance Analysis: Investigate budget vs. actual variances and provide explanations
  • Strategic Projects: Support M&A analysis, pricing studies, and business case development
  • Data Analysis: Work with large datasets to identify trends and business insights
  • Cross-functional Partnership: Collaborate with sales, marketing, and operations teams

REQUIREMENTS

Education: Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Economics, Accounting, or related quantitative field

Experience:

  • 3+ years of financial analysis experience
  • Experience with SaaS metrics and business models preferred
  • Background in high-growth technology companies is a plus

Technical Skills:

  • Excel/Google Sheets: Advanced modeling and analysis capabilities
  • BI Tools: Experience with Tableau, Looker, or similar visualization tools
  • SQL: Basic to intermediate SQL skills for data analysis
  • Financial Systems: Familiarity with ERP systems and financial databases

Analytical Skills:

  • Strong quantitative and analytical abilities
  • Experience with statistical analysis and forecasting
  • Ability to translate complex data into actionable insights
  • Understanding of SaaS unit economics

Soft Skills:

  • Excellent written and verbal communication
  • Strong presentation skills for executive audiences
  • Detail-oriented with strong organizational skills
  • Collaborative mindset and cross-functional experience

PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS

  • MBA or CFA designation
  • Experience with Python or R for data analysis
  • Knowledge of subscription business models
  • Background in financial modeling and valuation
  • Experience with investor relations or board reporting

WHY JOIN PLACER.AI?

  • Strategic Impact: Your analysis directly influences key business decisions
  • Growth Exposure: Learn from rapid scaling in a unicorn environment
  • Data-Rich Environment: Work with sophisticated datasets and analytics
  • Career Development: Opportunity for advancement in a growing finance organization
  • Competitive Package: Strong compensation, equity upside, and benefits

NOTEWORTHY LINKS

  • Placer.ai’s $100M Round C Funding
  • The Anchor (Data in Action)
  • Placer.ai in the News
  • Video: Placer for Commercial Real Estate

Equal Opportunity Employer: Placer.ai is an equal opportunity employer with a global remote workforce. We are committed to a drug-free workplace and providing reasonable accommodations for applicants with disabilities.
